endemo2.utility.prediction_models¶

Classes

Coef()

The container for the coefficients of different forecast methods.

Exp(x0, y0, r)

Create new instance of Exp(x0, y0, r)

Lin(k0, k1)

Create new instance of Lin(k0, k1)

PredictedTimeseries(historical_data, ...[, ...])

A variant of the timeseries class, where there is a manual forecast available that is read from the input and used for the forecast.

Quadr(k0, k1, k2)

Create new instance of Quadr(k0, k1, k2)

StartPoint(value)

Denotes the type of start points used for the exponential forecast method.

TimeStepSequence(historical_data, ...[, ...])

A variant of the timeseries class, where there is a forecast given in the shape of intervals with an exponential growth rate.

Timeseries(data, calculation_type[, ...])

A Timeseries holds information about a process' values from the past and provides projections into the future.
